sourceElement.description: JnJ PAC HIVE records with estimated delivery dates for this order entry.

targetElement.description: Link to the order entry associated with this PAC HIVE record.

itemtype.description: Stores data received from PAC HIVE AERA. This object contains estimated delivery date for some specific schedule line. This data has been intentionally separated from JnjDeliveryScheduleModel to avoid data clashes and conflicts. Even though JnjPacHive and JnjDeliverySchedule both store delivery dates but they come from different systems and it is better to keep it separate. Data in JnjPacHive comes from AERA and data in JnjDeliverySchedule comes from ERP system.

attribute.description: The original value of "company" field received from AERA.

The original value of "dataSource" field received from AERA.
The original value of "recommendedDeliveryDate" field received from AERA.
Date created by converting the original "recommendedDeliveryDate" field received from AERA.
The original value of "open confirmed quantity" field received from AERA.
The original value of "Jnj Subfranchise Description Harmonized" field received from AERA.
The original value of "Order Qty Sales Units" field received from AERA.
The original value of "Open Order Qty" field received from AERA.
The original value of "Current Bo Qty" field received from AERA.
